doctitle.textblock: Consumer Participation; Notice of Open Meeting

summary.textblock: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is announcing the following district consumer exchange meeting: Detroit, Michigan District Office, chaired by Carl Reynolds, District Director. The topics to be discussed are medical devices, current good manufacturing practice regulations, proposed revisions, and request for comments.

address.textblock: Methodist Hospital Auditorium, 1601 North Senate Ave., Indianapolis, IN 46206.

further.textblock: Janet LeClair, Public Affairs Specialist, Food and Drug Administration, 101 West Ohio St., Indianapolis, IN 46204, 317-226-6500.

supplem.textblock: The purpose of this meeting is to encourage dialogue between consumers and FDA officials, to identify and set priorities for current and future health concerns, to enhance relationships between local consumers and FDA's district offices, and to contribute to the agency's policymaking decisions on vital issues.
